abstract: Microsoft, Oracle, I.B.M. and a host of private equity firms helped drive technology mergers and acquisitions to a fourth consecutive record year in 2007. The introduction to The 451 Group’s Technology M&A Outlook report lists the year’s significant deals, identifies M&A drivers and looks at the outlook for 2008.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft, Oracle, I.B.M. and a host of private equity firms helped drive technology mergers and acquisitions to a fourth consecutive record year in 2007. The introduction to The 451 Group’s Technology M&A Outlook report lists the year’s significant deals, identifies M&A drivers and looks at the outlook for 2008.
